article.title: NIITEK to Support Husky Mounted Detection System
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: NIITEK Incorporated, Dulles, Virginia, was awarded a $49,499,467 firm-fixed-price contract for spare parts in support of the Husky Mounted Detection System. The U.S. Army Contracting Command, Fort Belvoir, Virginia, is the contracting activity.
